title: Single Day Plan
description: Tailored to your health goals and preferences

meals.description: Savory Indian-spiced oats with vegetables and plant protein
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Add cumin seeds and let them splutter for 30 seconds
Add diced onions and sauté until translucent (3-4 minutes)
Add diced tomatoes and cook until soft (2-3 minutes)
Add turmeric powder and crumbled tofu, mix well
Add oats and almond milk, stir continuously
Cook for 8-10 minutes until creamy consistency is reached
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve hot garnished with fresh herbs if available
meals.goal_alignment: High fiber and protein for satiety, moderate calories for weight loss

meals.description: Protein-rich chickpea curry with aromatic spices served over brown rice
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions (usually 45 minutes)
Heat coconut oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add finely chopped onions and sauté until golden (5-6 minutes)
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute until fragrant
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they break down (4-5 minutes)
Add garam masala and coriander powder, stir for 30 seconds
Add cooked chickpeas and water, bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until thick
Season with salt to taste
Serve hot over brown rice
meals.goal_alignment: High protein and fiber for satiety, complex carbs for sustained energy

meals.description: Creamy spinach curry with tofu served over protein-rich quinoa
instructions: Rinse quinoa and cook in 120ml water for 15 minutes until fluffy
Soak cashews in warm water for 10 minutes, then drain
Blanch spinach in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain
Blend blanched spinach with cashews and remaining water until smooth
Cut tofu into cubes and lightly pan-fry until golden
Heat coconut oil in a pan, add cumin seeds
Add chopped onions and ginger, sauté until soft (4-5 minutes)
Add spinach-cashew mixture and bring to a gentle boil
Add fried tofu cubes and simmer for 10 minutes
Season with salt and serve over quinoa
meals.goal_alignment: High protein from tofu and quinoa, low calorie density from spinach for weight loss

days.day_notes: This day focuses on traditional Indian flavors while maintaining vegan principles. Each meal provides sustained energy and satiety through protein and fiber combinations.

variety_score: Excellent variety with different cooking methods (sautéing, simmering, blanching) and diverse protein sources (tofu, chickpeas, quinoa)
goal_alignment: This plan supports weight loss through portion control, high fiber content for satiety, and balanced macronutrients. The Indian spices boost metabolism and add flavor without excess calories.
shopping_tips: Buy tofu in bulk and freeze portions. Pre-cook chickpeas and quinoa in batches. Fresh spinach can be blanched and frozen. Keep whole spices for better flavor - toast and grind as needed.
